eyata rajaye parshawaya pilithuru demin, awathanwu janathawage gatalu sambandhayen soyabalimata kamituwak pathkara sthana handunagena owunwa nawatha padinchi kirimata piyawara ganna bawath, deshapalana randawiyan pilibanda thorathuru raskara ee sandaha kriyamarga ganna bawath, aandukarawaru 9 denama marukarana bawath ehidi mema illim salakillata ganu athi bawath, amathyansha lekamwaru saha disthrik lekamwaru marukirima sambandhayen awadhanaya yomukarana bawath, wides ratawala sita paminena pudgalayin sandaha panawa athi awasarapath kramaya ahosi kirimata kriyamarga ganna bawath, janawargika gataluwata wisanduma sambandhayen soyabalimata kamituwak pathkara ee margayen ema karuna kriyathmaka karana bawath prakasha kara atha.
